title: The Rocksteady 25 (Dancing Man's Guide to Music)
description:
Hand-picked TUNES from the Jamaican phenomenon called "Rocksteady". The music mellowed out of ska in 1966 and ruled Jamaican dances for the next few years, before the reggae beat took over in 1968. This is for those that like a hard-dropping groove beneath soulful vocals.
